notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the python3.9 SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2. It addresses 8 CVEs: CVE-2024-11168, CVE-2024-9287, CVE-2023-6597, CVE-2024-0450, CVE-2024-4032, and 3 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: python3.9 security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2
